name: Mansion of Madness (sniderka)
description:
Trapped in an abandoned house, I think I am going mad!

We have made a horror haunted house game for the Senscape's Cursed Adventurous Jam with the theme  "We all go a little mad sometimes". The game (especially the house) was inspired by the Netflix series The Haunting of Bly Manor. The player explores the house and strange things keep on happening. 

Ines has made all the 3D assets in Blender and Jani has used Unreal for the first time to make the game. We have used the sounds from The Ultimate Sound FX Bundle and key prompt textures are from Those Awesome Guys. Cobwebs are from Riptide 3D, blood and dirt from Quixel Bridge. 

Movement: WASD 

Interaction: mouse click.

Best enjoyed with headphones and lights off.
